question: Edward spent $ 6 to buy 2 books each book costing him the same amount of money. Now he has $ 12. How much did each book cost?

phase2_reasoning.description: Compute the cost per book by dividing the total amount spent by the number of books.

phase2_reasoning.name: Evaluate Result
phase2_reasoning.description: Check that the final result answers the question.

question: Nell collects cards. She had 309 baseball cards and 356 Ace cards. She gave some of her cards to Jeff and now has 415 baseball cards and Ace cards left. How many more baseball cards than Ace cards does Nell have?

phase2_reasoning.name: Extract Relevant Information
phase2_reasoning.description: Identify and isolate the relevant information from the problem statement.
phase2_reasoning.resulting_state: Relevant information: Total pages = 594, Number of chapters = 3

phase2_reasoning.name: Identify Operation
phase2_reasoning.description: Determine which mathematical operation connects the quantities.

phase2_reasoning.name: Recognize Relationship Type
phase2_reasoning.description: Determine the type of relationship between the quantities (subtraction).
phase2_reasoning.applied_on_state: Relevant information: Initial amount = 110, Crayons given = 90, Crayons lost = 412

phase2_reasoning.name: Calculate Total Cards Initially
phase2_reasoning.description: Sum the initial number of baseball and Ace cards.

phase2_reasoning.name: Calculate Total Cards After Giving
phase2_reasoning.description: Sum the number of baseball and Ace cards after giving some to Jeff.

phase2_reasoning.name: Calculate Cards Given Away
phase2_reasoning.description: Subtract the total cards after giving from the total cards initially.
phase2_reasoning.applied_on_state: Total cards initially = 665, Total cards after giving = 415

phase2_reasoning.id: Determine Baseball and Ace Cards Given_c91d001f
phase2_reasoning.name: Determine Baseball and Ace Cards Given
phase2_reasoning.description: Determine the number of baseball and Ace cards given away based on the total cards given away.
phase2_reasoning.resulting_state: Subproblems: 1) Find number of baseball cards given, 2) Find number of Ace cards given

phase2_reasoning.name: Calculate Baseball Cards Given
phase2_reasoning.description: Subtract the number of baseball cards left from the initial number of baseball cards.
phase2_reasoning.applied_on_state: Baseball cards initially = 309, Baseball cards left = 415 (unknown)
phase2_reasoning.resulting_state: Baseball cards given = 309 - (415 - Ace cards left)

phase2_reasoning.name: Calculate Ace Cards Given
phase2_reasoning.description: Subtract the number of Ace cards left from the initial number of Ace cards.
phase2_reasoning.applied_on_state: Ace cards initially = 356, Ace cards left = 415 (unknown)
phase2_reasoning.resulting_state: Ace cards given = 356 - (415 - Baseball cards left)

phase2_reasoning.id: Calculate Difference Between Baseball and Ace Cards_cf97aeed
phase2_reasoning.name: Calculate Difference Between Baseball and Ace Cards
phase2_reasoning.description: Subtract the number of Ace cards left from the number of baseball cards left.
phase2_reasoning.applied_on_state: Baseball cards left = 415, Ace cards left = 415 (unknown)
phase2_reasoning.resulting_state: Difference = Baseball cards left - Ace cards left
